verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> you the Lord<WH3050>. I will praise<WH3034> the Lord<WH3068> with my whole heart<WH3824>, in the assembly<WH5475> of the upright<WH3477>, and in the congregation<WH5712>.
The works<WH4639> of the Lord<WH3068> are great<WH1419>, sought out<WH1875> of all them that have pleasure in it<WH2656>.
His work<WH6467> is honorable<WH1935> and glorious<WH1926>: and his righteousness<WH6666> endures<WH5975> for ever<WH5703>.
He has made<WH6213> his wonderful works<WH6381> to be remembered<WH2143>: the Lord<WH3068> is gracious<WH2587> and full of compassion<WH7349>.
He has given<WH5414> food<WH2964> unto them that fear<WH3373> him<WH5769>: he will ever be mindful<WH2142> of his covenant<WH1285>.
He has showed<WH5046> his people<WH5971> the power<WH3581> of his works<WH4639>, that he may give<WH5414> them the heritage<WH5159> of the heathen<WH1471>.
The works<WH4639> of his hands<WH3027> are truth<WH571> and judgment<WH4941>; all his commandments<WH6490> are sure<WH539>.
They stand fast<WH5564> for ever<WH5703> and ever<WH5769>, and are done<WH6213> in truth<WH571> and uprightness<WH3477>.
He sent<WH7971> redemption<WH6304> unto his people<WH5971>: he has commanded<WH6680> his covenant<WH1285> for ever<WH5769>: holy<WH6918> and reverend<WH3372> is his name<WH8034>.

The fear<WH3374> of the Lord<WH3068> is the beginning<WH7225> of wisdom<WH2451>: a good<WH2896> understanding<WH7922> have all they that do<WH6213> his commandments<WH8416>: his praise endures<WH5975> for ever<WH5703>.
